sentences.en: As I reposition, I look outside to see where I am relative to the crowd.
sentences.cn: 在我把飞机改平之后, 我观察舱外找准我与观众的相对距离.

sentences.en: Conclusions CAMRS could reproductively and effectively reposition mandible with little sleeping disturbance.
sentences.cn: 结论新研制的CAMRS系统运行稳定有效,对睡眠干扰小.

sentences.en: Decide where to reposition the dart and mark the site to the bust point.
sentences.cn: 重新确定省道位置,并对准胸点标出这个位置.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page, then drag yellow diamonds to adjust weight or reposition text.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页上, 然后拖动黄色菱形,以调节重量或重定位文本.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page. Drag the yellow diamond to reposition the triangle on the line.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页上. 拖动黄色菱形可以重新确定三角形在线条上的位置.

sentences.en: He used her improved condition reposition himself from the foot of her bed to her side.
sentences.cn: 它借她病情好转之机,从床脚转移到她身旁.

sentences.en: If howling occurs, reposition the speakers or turn down the volume on the amplifier.
sentences.cn: 如果发生啸声,请重新配置扬声器,或转小放大器的音量.

sentences.en: If she doesn't, reposition the brand in new markets.
sentences.cn: 要是她不回来, 该品牌必须定位于其它市场.

sentences.en: It is natural that any attempt to reposition management authority and responsibility will meet resistance.
sentences.cn: 很自然任何企图重新定位管理上的权威和责任都会遇到抵抗.

sentences.en: It is not possible to reposition the carpet without damaging it.
sentences.cn: 想要挪动地毯又不让它损坏是不可能的。

sentences.en: It is not possible to reposition the rug without damaging it.
sentences.cn: 想要挪动地毯又不损坏它是不可能的。

sentences.en: Mazda needs to reposition itself if it is to boost its sales and reputation.
sentences.cn: 要想提升销量和声誉，马自达公司需要对自己重新定位。

sentences.en: Postoperative retina reposition was in 14 eyes, recurrent retinal detachment in 2 eyes.
sentences.cn: 术后视网膜复位14眼, 视网膜脱离复发2眼.

sentences.en: Reposition and rename tabs and items.
sentences.cn: 重新定位与重命名选项卡和项.

sentences.en: To reposition Nigeria's downstream sub - sector for improved efficiency and transparency.
sentences.cn: 以复位尼日利亚的下游分部门,为提高效率和透明度.

sentences.en: You can reposition an item within its PivotTable field by dragging its border.
sentences.cn: 通过鼠标拖拽其边框的方式,可以调整数据项在透视表字段中的位置.

words.tran_cn: 贮藏室，仓库；知识库；智囊团
